item.title: SiteGround
item.dc:creator: N8FnGO1Y
item.content:encoded:
Are you looking for a reliable web hosting? It’s easy to sign up with any web host, but the problems arise when you have to tackle the day to day challenges of running a website. A successful website depends on the hosting speed, uptime, and security. The hosting should not come at a high cost, especially for new customers.
When you are looking for a great web hosting solution, you must consider the points mentioned above. The ease of website setup is another important consideration; a hosting provider should have a user-friendly control panel that allows users to set up their site with ‘one-click- install.’
Reliability and excellent customer support are two other considerations when selecting a web host.

item.title: InMotion
item.dc:creator: N8FnGO1Y
item.content:encoded:
InMotion has been around for some time (since 2001) – so they’ve seen a lot of online trends come and go. Over the period of time, their marketing strategy has changed, but they’ve always maintained their image as the “nerd’s choice”.
That shouldn’t put you off – their system is easy to use and they have plenty of training resources and great customer support.
They are one of the few big independent hosting companies around. Many other brands are owned by a few large corporations – for instance, Endurance International owns eHost, HostGator, and Bluehost (to name a few).
Operating as an independent company forces InMotion to compete in terms of service, performance, and pricing – and this is good news for customers!
